page.title: Titan Title
page.t: The latest approach of the Ministry of Finance to develop a mainline battleship, able to withstand even the biggest threats. The Fulmar is a massive but slow warship with strong shields and armor.\n\nFollowing the Teladi principle of maximizing profit and reducing costs, the ship was constructed under the usage of modules from itÂ´s sisterships, the Condor and the Stork.
